hanzi-su-wiki:
岸

Значения

Берег

Мнемоника

Обрывистый 厂 берег, о который как таран 干, бьются волны и откуда видны горы 山.

purpleculture_examples:
两岸 [ liǎng àn ]: bilateral; both shores; both sides; both coasts; Taiwan and mainland
口岸 [ kǒu àn ]: a port for external trade; a trading or transit post on border between countries
海岸 [ hǎi àn ]: coastal; seacoast
沿岸 [ yán àn ]: coastal area; littoral or riparian
对岸 [ duì àn ]: opposite bank (of a body of water)

heisig_chinese_memo: At the base of coastal mountain cliffs, there is always a shore of some sort like a beach. You often can see people lying there, drying off after a swim, and hanging there wet clothes on the public clotheslines.
koohiiStory1: At the base of mountain cliffs, there is usually a beach. You often can see people lying there, drying off after a swim.
koohiiStory2: Three impossibilities for a beach: There cannot be a beach at the top of a mountain. There cannot be a beach on the top of a cliff. There cannot be a beach that is completely dry.
jp_example_words:
沿岸(えんがん): coast, shore
岸(きし): bank, shore, coast
海岸(かいがん): sea shore
WaniKani_Meaning_Mnemonic: The mountain on top of the cliff is dry from the coast below. Just from looking at the raging shore below, you'd think everything would be wet, it's splashing everywhere!
WaniKani_Meaning_Info: You're on top of the mountain and the entire coast is stretching out below. The shore goes as far as your eyes can see.
WaniKani_Reading_Mnemonic: Sitting up there, watching the coast with you, is Gandhi (がん). The world famous Gandhi, is just hanging out up here with you, looking down at what you now realize must be a coast in India.
WaniKani_Reading_Info: Sit down next to Gandhi and close your eyes. You can hear the water hitting the shore below. The coastal birds are screaming. You crack open an eye and see Gandhi still sitting perfectly still.
Ru_Notes: Не путать: 岩 (いわ、ガン скала, валун, булыжник).
Ru_trainchinese:
àn: (сущ) берег
àn: (графема) (книжн.) высокий; гордый, надменный
Kanshudo_mnemonic: the mountain (山) with the dry (干) cliff (厂) is by the coast
chinese_mnemonics_deck__story: At the base of coastal mountain cliffs, there is always a shore of some sort like a beach. You often can see people lying there, drying off after a swim, and hanging there wet clothes on the public clotheslines.
humanum_full_description_en:
Bronze inscription from " factory ", " dry " sound. " Bank " refers to a highland near a cliff or water, which means a mountain bank or a river bank. "Shuowen": "The shore, the water cliff is high. From the dry sound." "Erya" Guo Pu's note: "The cliff is steep and the water is deep and the bank is called."

The first essay of " shore " is " 𢇛 ", seen in the inscriptions. From the wide to the dry sound, the inscriptions of "广" and " Factory " are nearly universal, so " 𢇛 " is the same as "厈", and the word " shore " should be from " Factory ". " Chang " is the provincial shape of " stone ", like a rock cliff. Therefore, the original meaning of " shore " refers to the high ground by the cliff, and the extension also refers to the high ground by the water. Bronze text or add "攴" next to it.

Bronze writing is used as the original meaning to indicate the shore. In the Western Zhou Dynasty, the university was called Biyong. It was a place for lectures, shooting, and drinking. It was surrounded by pools and a hall was built in the middle. The " 𢇛 " (shore) in the inscriptions of the Western Zhou Dynasty refers to the high ground by the water of the university. Zhou Wang often gave orders and rewards to his subjects on the " 𢇛 " (shore) (see Shengwu and Yang Kuan).

" Factory ", "厈", "屵" and " shore " were the ancient words. " Chang " is the shape of the rocky cliff of Xiangshan, and the sound symbol " gan " is added as "厈" for the rising pictophonetic character, and the symbol " shan " is added for " shore ". Shan'an and He'an were originally one character (see Rao Jiong, Chinese Dictionary). " Chang " in " Shuowen " is made "厈", see " Chang ".
humanum_short_description_en: " Chang " in the bronze inscription is like a mountain cliff. " Qian " is a sound symbol. The original meaning refers to a highland near a mountain or water. " Mountain " is a postscript.
humanum_full_description:
金文從「厂」，「干」聲。「岸」指靠近山崖或水邊的高地，表示山岸、河岸。《說文》：「岸，水厓而高者。从屵干聲。」《爾雅》郭璞注：「厓峻而水深曰岸。」

　　「岸」初文作「𢇛」，見於金文。從广從干聲，「广」、「厂」金文形近通用，故「𢇛」與「厈」同，「岸」字當從「厂」義。「厂」是「石」的省形，象巖崖之形。故「岸」本義表示崖邊的高地，引申亦指水邊的高地。金文或加「攴」旁。

　　金文用作本義，表示岸邊。西周時的大學稱為璧雍，是講學、習射、饗飲之所，四周有水池環繞，中間高地建有廳堂。西周金文的「𢇛」(岸)，便是指大學水邊的高地。周王常常在「𢇛」(岸)上對臣屬施行命令及賞賜(參于省吾、楊寬)。

　　「厂」、「厈」、「屵」、「岸」古為一字。「厂」為象山石巖崖之形，加聲符「干」作「厈」為後起形聲字，再加形符「山」作「岸」。山岸、河岸原為一字(參饒炯、漢語大字典)。《說文》「厂」籀文作「厈」，參見「厂」。
humanum_short_description: 金文「厂」象山崖，「干」是聲符，本義指山或水邊的高地。「山」是後加形符。

沿岸(えんがん): coast, shore
岸(きし): bank, shore, coast
海岸(かいがん): sea shore

金文從「 厂 」，「 干 」聲。「 岸 」指靠近山崖或水邊的高地，表示山岸、河岸。《說文》：「岸，水厓而高者。从屵干聲。」《爾雅》郭璞注：「厓峻而水深曰岸。」 「 岸 」初文作「 𢇛 」，見於金文。從广從干聲，「 广 」、「 厂 」金文形近通用，故「 𢇛 」與「 厈 」同，「 岸 」字當從「 厂 」義。「 厂 」是「 石 」的省形，象巖崖之形。故「 岸 」本義表示崖邊的高地，引申亦指水邊的高地。金文或加「 攴 」旁。 金文用作本義，表示岸邊。西周時的大學稱為璧雍，是講學、習射、饗飲之所，四周有水池環繞，中間高地建有廳堂。西周金文的「 𢇛 」(岸)，便是指大學水邊的高地。周王常常在「 𢇛 」(岸)上對臣屬施行命令及賞賜(參于省吾、楊寬)。 「 厂 」、「 厈 」、「 屵 」、「 岸 」古為一字。「 厂 」為象山石巖崖之形，加聲符「 干 」作「 厈 」為後起形聲字，再加形符「 山 」作「 岸 」。山岸、河岸原為一字(參饒炯、漢語大字典)。《說文》「 厂 」籀文作「 厈 」，參見「 厂 」。
Bronze inscription from " factory", " dry" sound. " Bank" refers to a highland near a cliff or water, which means a mountain bank or a river bank. "Shuowen": "The shore, the water cliff is high. From the dry sound." "Erya" Guo Pu's note: "The cliff is steep and the water is deep and the bank is called." The first essay of " shore" is " 𢇛", seen in the inscriptions. From the wide to the dry sound, the inscriptions of " 广" and " Factory" are nearly universal, so " 𢇛" is the same as " 厈", and the word " shore" should be from " Factory". " Chang" is the provincial shape of " stone", like a rock cliff. Therefore, the original meaning of " shore" refers to the high ground by the cliff, and the extension also refers to the high ground by the water. Bronze text or add " 攴" next to it. Bronze writing is used as the original meaning to indicate the shore. In the Western Zhou Dynasty, the university was called Biyong. It was a place for lectures, shooting, and drinking. It was surrounded by pools and a hall was built in the middle. The " 𢇛" (shore) in the inscriptions of the Western Zhou Dynasty refers to the high ground by the water of the university. Zhou Wang often gave orders and rewards to his subjects on the " 𢇛" (shore) (see Shengwu and Yang Kuan). " Factory", " 厈", " 屵" and " shore" were the ancient words. " Chang" is the shape of the rocky cliff of Xiangshan, and the sound symbol " gan" is added as " 厈" for the rising pictophonetic character, and the symbol " shan" is added for " shore". Shan'an and He'an were originally one character (see Rao Jiong, Chinese Dictionary). " Chang" in " Shuowen" is made " 厈", see " Chang".

岸字的基本解释

岸
àn
水边的陆地：河岸。上岸。两岸。
高大：伟岸（魁伟，高直）。魁岸。
高傲：岸忽（傲慢）。傲岸。
头饰高戴，前额外露：岸帻（把头巾掀起露出前额，表示态度洒脱，不拘束）。
古同“犴”，乡间牢狱。

岸字的汉语字典释义

[①]［àn］
［《廣韻》五旰切，去翰，疑。］
亦作“厈1”。亦作“屽2”。
(1)水边高起之地。
(2)高傲，严正。
(3)谓将冠帽上推，露出前额。
(4)通“犴”。古代乡亭的拘留所。详“岸獄”。
(5)见“魁岸”。

岸字的英文翻译

◎ 岸
bank, shore

岸字的康熙字典解释

【寅集中】【山字部】　岸； 康熙笔画：8； 页码：页310第03
【唐韻】五旰切【集韻】魚旰切【韻會】疑旰切【正韻】魚幹切，?音犴。【說文】水厓而高者。【爾雅·釋地】望厓洒而高岸。【註】厓峻而水深曰岸。【詩·衞風】淇則有岸。【小雅】高岸爲谷。　又階也。【張衡·西京賦】襄岸夷塗。【註】襄，高也。岸，殿階也。　又魁岸，雄傑也。【前漢·江充傳】爲人魁岸。【註】岸者，有廉稜如崖岸形。【唐書·宦者傳】仇士良以李石稜稜有風岸深忌之。　又道岸。【詩·大雅】誕先登于岸。【註】道之極至處也。　又露額曰岸。【後漢·馬援傳】帝岸幘見援。　又獄名。【詩·小雅】宜岸宜獄。【註】鄕亭之繫曰岸，朝廷曰獄。韓詩作犴。

岸字的源字形

岸字的起名意思

：主要字义是指水边的陆地之意，也有高大、头饰高戴，前额外露的意思。

shore
Basic explanation of words
shore
àn
Land by the water: the river bank. Go ashore. Cross-strait.
Tall: stalwart (burly, tall and straight). Kui An.
Haughty: Anhu (arrogance). proud.
Wear the headgear high, and the front is extra exposed: Kishi 帻 (lift the headscarf to expose the forehead, expressing a free and unrestrained attitude).
Gu Tong, "Y", was jailed in the country.
shore
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［àn］
["Guangyun" five cuts, go to Han, doubt. ]
Also known as "厈1". Also known as "屽2".
(1) A place that rises by the water's edge.
(2) Haughty and solemn.
(3) It is said that the crown cap is pushed up to expose the forehead.
(4) Through "Y". The detention center of the ancient Xiangting Pavilion. See "Ashore Prison".
(5) See "Qui An".
shore
English translation of words
◎ Shore
bank, shore
shore
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Yin Collection] [Mountain Character Department] 　岸; Kangxi Strokes: 8; Page Number: Page 310 03
[Tang Yun] Five cuts [Jiyun] Fish cuts [Yunhui] Suspicious cuts [Positive rhymes] Dried fish cuts, ?Yin 犴. [Said the text] The water cliff is taller. 【Erya·Shidi】Wang the cliff sprinkles and rises above the shore. [Note] The cliff is steep and the water is deep, called the shore. 【Poetry·Weifeng】Qi has a shore. [Xiaoya] The high shore is the valley.　Again. 【Zhang Heng·Xijing Fu】Xiang'an Yitu. [Note] Xiang, Gao Ye. The shore, the temple steps are also.　Quiean, Xiongjie. [Previous Han·Jiang Chong Biography] Kui'an. [Note] Those on the shore have a clean edge like a cliff. [Tang Shu·Eunuch Biography] Qiu Shiliang is deeply jealous of Li Shiling's windy shore.　Daoan again. 【Poetry·Daya】The birthday is on the shore first. [Note] The extreme of Tao is everywhere.　Exposing the forehead again said shore. [Later Han·Ma Yuan Biography] Seeing assistance from Emperor Anji.　Also known as prison. 【Poetry·Xiaoya】Yi An Yi Ji. [Note] The line of the pavilion is called shore, and the court is called prison. Han poems are made of 犴.
shore
Source glyph
shore
Name meaning
: The main meaning of the word refers to the land by the water, and it also means tall, high-wearing headwear, and extra exposure in front.

“序”。最后又加义符“山”作“岸”"。

岸。”本义是“靠水边的高地”。《诗

(недостаток)
Берег
Слово «берег» изначально было произведено как «фабрика».
«Фабрика» - это обрыв и вода.
Позже в качестве «предисловия» был добавлен звуковой символ «ган».
Наконец, значение «гора» добавлено как «берег». «Слова»: «Использование, давление воды (конец) высокое.
Популярный как берег.
«Первоначальное значение -« возвышенность у воды ».« Книга песен »:« У Ци есть берег.
"

2) * темница, тюрьма
宜岸 подлежать заключению в тюрьму
II прил. /наречие
1) высокий, заметный, выдающийся
伟岸 массивный, внушительный
魁岸 заметный, представительный;
2) гордый, заносчивый
傲岸 зазнаваться
III гл.
* обнажить лоб; сдвинуть головной убор на затылок
Radicals: 山, 厂, 干  (mountain, cliff, dry)
Meaning Mnemonic
The mountain on top of the cliff is dry from the coast below. Just from looking at the raging shore below, you'd think everything would be wet, it's splashing everywhere!
You're on top of the mountain and the entire coast is stretching out below. The shore goes as far as your eyes can see.
Reading Mnemonic
Sitting up there, watching the coast with you, is Gandhi (がん). The world famous Gandhi, is just hanging out up here with you, looking down at what you now realize must be a coast in India.
Sit down next to Gandhi and close your eyes. You can hear the water hitting the shore below. The coastal birds are screaming. You crack open an eye and see Gandhi still sitting perfectly still.
